author: cnbc.com
title: HP Inc. Board Declares Dividend
text:
PALO ALTO, Calif., May 14, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The HP Inc. board of directors has declared a cash dividend of $0.1393 per share on the company’s common stock.
The dividend, the third in HP’s fiscal year 2018, is payable on July 5, 2018, to stockholders of record as of the close of business on June 13, 2018. HP has approximately 1.61 billion shares of common stock outstanding.
About HP Inc.
HP Inc. creates technology that makes life better for everyone, everywhere. Through our portfolio of printers, PCs, mobile devices, solutions, and services, we engineer experiences that amaze. More information about HP Inc. (NYSE:HPQ) is available at http://www.hp.com .
